00001 <?php
00004 //        available at http://phpthumb.sourceforge.net     ///
00007 // phpthumb.ico.php - .ICO output format functions          //
00008 //                                                         ///
00010 
00011 
00012 class phpthumb_ico {
00013 
00014  function phpthumb_ico() {
00015   return true;
00016  }
00017 
00018 
00019  function GD2ICOstring(&$gd_image_array) {
00020   foreach ($gd_image_array as $key => $gd_image) {
00021 
00022    $ImageWidths[$key]  = ImageSX($gd_image);
00023    $ImageHeights[$key] = ImageSY($gd_image);
00024       $bpp[$key]          = ImageIsTrueColor($gd_image) ? 32 : 24;
00025       $totalcolors[$key]  = ImageColorsTotal($gd_image);
00026 
00027    $icXOR[$key] = '';
00028    for ($y = $ImageHeights[$key] - 1; $y >= 0; $y--) {
00029     for ($x = 0; $x < $ImageWidths[$key]; $x++) {
00030      $argb = phpthumb_functions::GetPixelColor($gd_image, $x, $y);
00031      $a = round(255 * ((127 - $argb['alpha']) / 127));
00032      $r = $argb['red'];
00033      $g = $argb['green'];
00034      $b = $argb['blue'];
00035 
00036      if ($bpp[$key] == 32) {
00037       $icXOR[$key] .= chr($b).chr($g).chr($r).chr($a);
00038      } elseif ($bpp[$key] == 24) {
00039       $icXOR[$key] .= chr($b).chr($g).chr($r);
00040      }
00041 
00042      if ($a < 128) {
00043       @$icANDmask[$key][$y] .= '1';
00044      } else {
00045       @$icANDmask[$key][$y] .= '0';
00046      }
00047     }
00048     // mask bits are 32-bit aligned per scanline
00049     while (strlen($icANDmask[$key][$y]) % 32) {
00050      $icANDmask[$key][$y] .= '0';
00051     }
00052    }
00053    $icAND[$key] = '';
00054    foreach ($icANDmask[$key] as $y => $scanlinemaskbits) {
00055     for ($i = 0; $i < strlen($scanlinemaskbits); $i += 8) {
00056      $icAND[$key] .= chr(bindec(str_pad(substr($scanlinemaskbits, $i, 8), 8, '0', STR_PAD_LEFT)));
00057     }
00058    }
00059 
00060   }
00061 
00062      foreach ($gd_image_array as $key => $gd_image) {
00063    $biSizeImage = $ImageWidths[$key] * $ImageHeights[$key] * ($bpp[$key] / 8);
00064 
00065       // BITMAPINFOHEADER - 40 bytes
00066    $BitmapInfoHeader[$key]  = '';
00067    $BitmapInfoHeader[$key] .= "\x28\x00\x00\x00";                              // DWORD  biSize;
00068    $BitmapInfoHeader[$key] .= phpthumb_functions::LittleEndian2String($ImageWidths[$key], 4);      // LONG   biWidth;
00069    // The biHeight member specifies the combined
00070    // height of the XOR and AND masks.
00071    $BitmapInfoHeader[$key] .= phpthumb_functions::LittleEndian2String($ImageHeights[$key] * 2, 4); // LONG   biHeight;
00072       $BitmapInfoHeader[$key] .= "\x01\x00";                                      // WORD   biPlanes;
00073       $BitmapInfoHeader[$key] .= chr($bpp[$key])."\x00";                          // wBitCount;
00074    $BitmapInfoHeader[$key] .= "\x00\x00\x00\x00";                              // DWORD  biCompression;
00075    $BitmapInfoHeader[$key] .= phpthumb_functions::LittleEndian2String($biSizeImage, 4);            // DWORD  biSizeImage;
00076       $BitmapInfoHeader[$key] .= "\x00\x00\x00\x00";                              // LONG   biXPelsPerMeter;
00077       $BitmapInfoHeader[$key] .= "\x00\x00\x00\x00";                              // LONG   biYPelsPerMeter;
00078       $BitmapInfoHeader[$key] .= "\x00\x00\x00\x00";                              // DWORD  biClrUsed;
00079       $BitmapInfoHeader[$key] .= "\x00\x00\x00\x00";                              // DWORD  biClrImportant;
00080   }
00081 
00082 
00083   $icondata  = "\x00\x00";                                      // idReserved;   // Reserved (must be 0)
00084   $icondata .= "\x01\x00";                                      // idType;       // Resource Type (1 for icons)
00085   $icondata .= phpthumb_functions::LittleEndian2String(count($gd_image_array), 2);  // idCount;      // How many images?
00086 
00087   $dwImageOffset = 6 + (count($gd_image_array) * 16);
00088   foreach ($gd_image_array as $key => $gd_image) {
00089       // ICONDIRENTRY   idEntries[1]; // An entry for each image (idCount of 'em)
00090 
00091       $icondata .= chr($ImageWidths[$key]);                     // bWidth;          // Width, in pixels, of the image
00092       $icondata .= chr($ImageHeights[$key]);                    // bHeight;         // Height, in pixels, of the image
00093       $icondata .= chr($totalcolors[$key]);                     // bColorCount;     // Number of colors in image (0 if >=8bpp)
00094       $icondata .= "\x00";                                      // bReserved;       // Reserved ( must be 0)
00095 
00096       $icondata .= "\x01\x00";                                  // wPlanes;         // Color Planes
00097    $icondata .= chr($bpp[$key])."\x00";                      // wBitCount;       // Bits per pixel
00098 
00099    $dwBytesInRes = 40 + strlen($icXOR[$key]) + strlen($icAND[$key]);
00100    $icondata .= phpthumb_functions::LittleEndian2String($dwBytesInRes, 4);       // dwBytesInRes;    // How many bytes in this resource?
00101 
00102       $icondata .= phpthumb_functions::LittleEndian2String($dwImageOffset, 4);      // dwImageOffset;   // Where in the file is this image?
00103    $dwImageOffset += strlen($BitmapInfoHeader[$key]);
00104    $dwImageOffset += strlen($icXOR[$key]);
00105    $dwImageOffset += strlen($icAND[$key]);
00106      }
00107 
00108      foreach ($gd_image_array as $key => $gd_image) {
00109    $icondata .= $BitmapInfoHeader[$key];
00110    $icondata .= $icXOR[$key];
00111    $icondata .= $icAND[$key];
00112      }
00113 
00114      return $icondata;
00115  }
00116 
00117 }
00118
